channel.title: Software on Oliver Weissbarth
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Oliver Weissbarth

item.title: BookGen
item.description: BookGen is a free book-generation addon for the open-source 3D-package Blender. It allows you to fill shelves or create stacks of books – fast and easily. Features: Fill shelves or create stacks of books control width, height, depth, cover thickness and more parameters of the books use randomization to generate a variety of different books parametric UV-Map for texturing Installation: Download the .

item.title: ImReveal
item.description: A bit of js to show the “before and after” of two images Usage Simply include the imReveal js and css files into your page. Your two image should be wrapped by a container. Then simply create a new imReveal object by passing it the wrapper HTMLElement.
